name: ZombaTron
description:
The point of having good A.I. in a game is not for them to just kill the player. That would just make them rage quit. Instead it is to ensure that the player enjoys their time with the game, but without growing TOO bored.

You are that A.I.

Controlling a tower defense game, your goal is to collaborate and keep the player interested enough to continue playing for as long as possible, controlling the type and spawn rate of the various zombies.

If the Zombies are too far away from the player, the happiness bar slowly depleats, and if it reaches zero, the Player shuts off the game. Be sure to keep the game exciting, but be warned, if you spawn too many at once to overwhelm the player, they may call BS and quit the game in turn.

Programming - Equilius

Art - Mr. Craft
